name: Organic Cotton Brimmed Beanie for Boy
description:
This baby newsboy was crocheted with an oatmeal color ultra soft organic cotton yarn. This high quality yarn is perfect for your little one's sensitive skin. I designed this pattern myself because I loved the texture of the basket weave stitch. The brim is pliable enough to be shaped as you prefer, but firm enough to stay in place once you find your perfect shape.

This is an oatmeal color hat with a cocoa brown stripe. It is perfect for your friend's upcoming baby shower. If you are looking for a different size or color hat, please send me a message. I am happy to make custom hats.

Height: 7.25 inches/18 cm (enough to keep the top of your ears warm)
Circumference: 15.5 inches/40 cm (with some stretch)
(this should fit a 3 to 6 month old)

Care: Hand wash and dry flat.

name: Organic Cotton Slouch with Bow
description:
Handmade crocheted slouch (tam) with bow in mustard yellow.

Made with a soft, luxurious 100% organic cotton yarn. Hand wash and dry flat.

This is my own pattern. This hat gives you lots of options; it can be worn as a slouchy hat or beanie. The bow is attached by a pin. The slouch can be worn with or without the bow, and the pin can be attached to elsewhere for the perfect accessory!

For me, a hat needs to be something stylish, warm, reflective of my personality and mood, and easily transitioned from dress to casual. It needs to be able to withstand the busyness of my day-to-day life without completely ruining my hair. I demand a lot from my hats, and this one definitely answers!

The nitty-gritty details:
Circumference: 21 inches/ 52 cm (will fit most heads)
Hat Length: 7.5 inches/ 19 cm
Bow Length: inches/ 9 cm
Bow Height: 1 inch/ 3 cm

If you are looking for a different size or color hat, please send me a message. I am happy to make custom hats.

name: Organic Cotton Newsboy with Flower
description:
This adorable crochet newsboy was made with a super soft organic cotton yarn. This is a spring green hat with a baby blue flower. This high quality yarn is so soft you will have to feel it for yourself to believe me. I designed this pattern myself because I loved the texture of the basket weave stitch. The brim is pliable enough to be shaped as you prefer, but firm enough to stay in place once you find your perfect shape.

A vintage button secures a cotton flower onto the side of the hat. The flower can be easily removed to be replaced with another flower. Email me if you would like additional flowers added to your order. 

Note: Vintage button may differ from the one in the picture, but will be just perfect! If you have a color preference, please let me know in the buyer's notes.

If you would prefer a hat without a flower, please let me know in the buyer's notes.

The nitty-gritty details:
Height: 7 inches/ 18 cm(enough to keep the top of your ears warm)
Circumference: 20 inches/ 50cm (with some stretch)
Flower size: 2.5 inches/6 cm
Care: Hand wash, dry flat.

Please note this hat is made to order. If you are looking for a different size or color hat, please send me a message. I am happy to custom make hats for just for you.

name: Gray Brimmed Beanie with Heart
description:
This adorable handmade hat was crocheted with a soft gray acrylic yarn. I designed this pattern myself because I loved the texture of the basket weave stitch. The brim is pliable enough to be shaped as you prefer, but firm enough to stay in place once you find your perfect shape.

A vintage button secures a coordinating pink heart onto the side of the hat. The heart can be easily removed to be replaced with a flower.  

The yarn is machine wash and dryable, but I would wash with care just to be on the safe side.

The nitty-gritty details:
Height: 7 inches/18 cm (enough to keep the top of your ears warm)
Circumference: 20 inches/50 cm (with some stretch)
Heart size: 2 inches/5 cm

Note: This hat is made to order. Please let me know if you would prefer a different color or size in the buyer notes. I will custom make hats for the same price. This would make an adorable little girl's hat!
